text: The word Shamir was used as a personal name (Git. 68a). The Hebrew word self as insignificant, as the prayer says:"What am I? A worm,he is the Shamir and such a man fulfils the Shmah, loves the Lord God with all his heart, and with all his soul and with all his might and studies the word of God..
